quotes.text: The best things in life are actually really expensive.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It's just been too intelligent to come here.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.text: “TEAMWORK: A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.author: Justin Sewell

quotes.text: The light at the end of the tunnel has been turned off due to budget cuts.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: I love mankind... it's people I can't stand!
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.text: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
quotes.author: Alan Dundes

quotes.text: It’s only when you look at an ant through a magnifying glass on a sunny day that you realize how often they burst into flames.
quotes.author: Harry Hill

quotes.text: Trying is the first step toward failure.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.text: When we talk to God, we’re praying. When God talks to us, we’re schizophrenic.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.text: The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.text: Every corpse on Mount Everest was once an extremely motivated individual.
quotes.author: Rabbit Cohen

quotes.text: Simplicity: The simplest solutions are often the cleverest. They are also usually wrong.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Nothing says 'you're a loser' more than owning a motivational poster about being a winner.
quotes.author: Justin Sewell

quotes.text: Success is just failure that hasn't happened yet.
quotes.author: Latrell Sprewell

quotes.text: Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong.
quotes.author: Murphy's Law
